questions.question: The man ……………………………. we met in the store is my neighbor.
questions.description: Whom and that are possible here. Who is also possible here in a less careful style.

questions.question: The girl …………………………….. paid for my drinks seemed rich.
questions.description: Either who or that can refer to people in identifying relative clauses.

questions.question: Where is the child ……………………………… wanted an ice cream?
questions.description: Use who to refer to people and which to refer to things.

questions.question: I have lost the watch …………………………… I bought yesterday.
questions.description: In identifying relative clauses either which or that can refer to things.

questions.question: The day …………………………….. my son was born is the happiest day of my life.
The man ……………………….. interviewed me was very knowledgeable.
He has four cars all of …………………………… are imported.
I talked to the guy …………………………… repaired my computer.
The man ………………………………. died in the accident was a rich merchant.
The police arrested the man ……………………………. made the hoax call.
The boy ………………………….. leg is broken will need complete bed rest for at least six months.
questions.description: Whose can replace pronouns like his, her, their etc.

questions.question: The girl ……………………………. opened the door was quite cute.
questions.description: Either who or that is possible here.
